description: Defines the AppShell widget, a reusable scaffold component used throughout the Flutter mobile app, providing a consistent app bar and optional offline indicator.

classes.name: AppShell
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that provides a scaffold with an app bar and optional offline mode banner.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the AppShell, including the app bar, optional offline banner, and child content.
